com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom
Class SimpleVertex

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom.SimpleVertex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vertex
public class SimpleVertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vertex

Represents one vertex. This is a simple bean implementation of the Vertex interface.

Version:
$Id: SimpleVertex.java,v 1.5 2006/07/06 06:58:35 martin Exp $
Author:
martin

Constructor Detail

SimpleVertex

public SimpleVertex()
Creates a new instance of SimpleVertex. The new object will have a zero normal and position, be coloured black and not be emissive.

SimpleVertex

public SimpleVertex(Vertex v)
Create a new instance of SimpleVertex as a copy of an existing one

Parameters:
v - The vertex to use to initialize the new object

SimpleVertex

public SimpleVertex(XYZ p)
Create a new instance of SimpleVertex at a particular point

Parameters:
p - The point to assign to the position of this vertex
